0.8.name: wordpress/lyricwikisearch
0.8.description:
LyricWiki is a free site which is a source where anyone can go to get reliable lyrics for any song from any artist without being hammered by invasive ads.

This plugin provides a widget to place a search box right on the sidebar of your WordPress site so that your readers can utilize the LyricWiki site and find their favorite lyrics from your blog!
